tool.name: OGS: VTK2TIN
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'VTK2TIN'.
tool.command: for i in $mesh_input_file; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; VTK2TIN --mesh-input-file '$mesh_input_file.element_identifier' --TIN-output-file output_1.tin

param.name: mesh_input_file
param.label: mesh input file
param.help: Input (.vtk). the file containing the input mesh

tool.help: This tool runs the **VTK2TIN** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
